network.infraredPacket: Get most recent packet received over IR.
network.infraredSendNumber: Sends a numbers over the infrared transmitter diode
network.infraredSendNumbers: Sends an array of numbers of infrared. The combined size of the array should be less or equal to 32 bytes.
network.onInfraredError: Run action after there's an error reciving packet over IR.
network.onInfraredPacket: Run action after a packet is recieved over IR.
network.onInfraredPacketReceived: Registers code to run when the infrared receives a packet.
